sys_hub_flow.description: ServiceNow instance prior to Vancouver Patch 6 / Washington suffer from a bug, where an non-existing guest-user makes it impossible for SSH Private Key decryption. This subflow checks wether the remote instance is affected by this bug and creates a task with fix instructions.

sys_element_mapping.value:
assigned_to={{subflow.user}}^short_description=Apply Workaround for Instance SSH Key Decryption Bug^description=The Instance {{subflow.instance.url}} cannot decrypt the SSH Key which is required for all Marketplace operations due to a bug (fixed in washington - PRB1717975). Please do the following as a workaround: 1.) Create a guest user (sys_user.do): User ID: guest Last name: Guest Active: true Email: guest@example.com Language: English
2.) Execute the following code in a Background script in "scope = global" with "Record for rollback = false": GlideCacheManager.flush("frequest_use_cache")

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.label: Wait For Completion
sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs.name: var__m_sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs_c3a47a6b872f75102a3163583cbb35cf
